string.name: invalid_email_address
string.translation_description: Inline error for invalid email address

string.name: missing_email_address
string.translation_description: Inline error for empty email address in input field

string.name: progress_dialog_checking_accounts
string.translation_description: Progress dialog text while checking for existing accounts

string.name: error_email_does_not_exist
string.translation_description: Inline error when user attempt signin with invalid account

resources.string: No existe ningun usuario con ese email

string.name: welcome_back_idp_header
string.translation_description: Inline subtitle to users whose signup was interrupted since an existing account was detected

resources.string: Existe una cuenta con ese email

string.name: welcome_back_idp_prompt
string.translation_description: Message to users that need to signin using existing IDP accounts

resources.string: Existe una cuenta con %1$s. Inicia sesión con %2$s para continuar.

string.name: welcome_back_password_prompt_body
string.translation_description: Message to users that need to signin using existing email accounts

resources.string: Ya has usado %1$s para iniciar sesión. Introduce tu contraseña para iniciar sesión.

string.name: trouble_signing_in
string.translation_description: Link leading to forgot password flow

resources.string: Se enviara un correo electronico con las instrucciones para recuperar tu contraseña.

string.name: button_text_send
string.translation_description: Button text to send recovery email

string.name: confirm_recovery_body
string.translation_description: Alert dialog displayed after password recovery email is sent

resources.string: Sigue las instrucciones enviadas a %1$s para recuperar la contraseña.

string.name: progress_dialog_sending
string.translation_description: Progress dialog while password recovery email is being sent
